video.title: Inside Man
video.synopsis: Acclaimed documentary filmmaker Morgan Spurlock hosts this CNN original series that provides an insider's view of diverse sectors of American life.

episodes.synopsis: Morgan explores the highs and lows of the medical marijuana industry as he works in a dispensary and investigates the legalization of marijuana.
episodes.title: Marijuana

episodes.synopsis: To explore the issue of gun control, Morgan embeds himself in the world of gun dealers, culminating with a trip to the largest gun show in America.
episodes.title: Guns

episodes.synopsis: As states crack down on illegal immigrants, Morgan joins the plight of the more than 1.3 million migrant workers who are in search of work.
episodes.title: Immigration

episodes.synopsis: Morgan visits a school in Finland to learn about educational philosophies that are being put into action at a Brooklyn charter school.
episodes.title: Education

episodes.synopsis: To explore the complexities of dying in America, Morgan volunteers for an end-of-life care organization and discusses Medicare, health care and more.
episodes.title: Elder Care

episodes.synopsis: In the bankrupt city of Stockton, Calif., where vacant houses attract squatters, Morgan joins a patrol group devoted to the safety of the residents.
episodes.title: Bankruptcy

episodes.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock spends time living and working with a family of Nebraska ranchers who are affected by the previous year's severe drought.
episodes.title: Drought

episodes.synopsis: Labor unions formed to guarantee Americans' workplace rights. Now, with laws in place that protect workers, are unions still relevant?
episodes.title: Unions

episodes.synopsis: Morgan learns the paparazzi's tricks of the trade to explore America's obsession with celebrity and sensationalism.
episodes.title: Celebrity

episodes.synopsis: Morgan enters the brave new world of extreme life extension, from harvesting 3D-printed replacement parts to uploading his consciousness.
episodes.title: Futurism

episodes.synopsis: From toy dogs in fancy purses to shelter animals, Morgan takes a humorous and poignant look at America's cultural obsession with pets.
episodes.title: Pets

episodes.synopsis: To uncover the truth about how businesses and the government collect personal data, Morgan investigates how much information is kept on him.
episodes.title: Privacy

episodes.synopsis: Morgan travels to Nashville to become a guest preacher at an atheist church and visits evangelical mega-churches, mosques and Mormon gatherings.
episodes.title: The Book of Morgan

episodes.synopsis: Morgan steeps himself in the history, theories and photographic "evidence" of UFO sightings, embedding himself in groups of believers.
episodes.title: UFOs

episodes.synopsis: After moving into one of the most exclusive properties in America, Morgan splits his time living with the 1 percent and the other 99 percent.
episodes.title: Income Inequality

episodes.synopsis: Morgan joins some of the best college sports programs in the U.S. to see what it's like to be a star athlete under the watchful eye of the NCAA.
episodes.title: College Athletes
